Message:
I’ve been gifted since
the day I was born,

but I’m not actually
a genius or anything.
It’s just the influence
of the seed.

In exchange, my life
expectancy is cut short.

But, the entire point of
my existence has always just been
to read the memories in the seed,
even if that ends my life.

So, till the day I finally croak,
my life is all about killin’ time.
Before that, so long as
I’m still alive and kickin’,
who cares what I do?

My enhanced intellect meant
I’d already mastered most things,
and the teachers made sure I had
everything I could ever dream of.

There was no reason for me to feel
at all dissatisfied with my life.

But, y’know, it just felt like
somethin’ was missin’.

I didn’t want for anythin’,
but there was nothin’ fun
in my life either...

That’s why at first,
I didn’t have the slightest interest
in that experiment goin’ on...
